ReqFlow Documentation
=====================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   usage
   api

ReqFlow is a Postman-like terminal tool for API testing with Redis backend and AI assistance.

Features
--------

* HTTP/REST API testing
* Redis-backed request history and caching
* Template management
* Environment variable support
* AI-powered assistance
* Rich terminal interface

Installation
------------

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install reqflow

Quick Start
-----------

.. code-block:: bash

   apitester --help
   apitester status
   apitester request send GET https://httpbin.org/get
